articles.description: Manchester United advance straight to the Europa League last 16 as Kobbie Mainoo scores one and assists another at FCSB.

articles.description: Tottenham overcome another injury setback thanks to their talented youngsters as victory over Elfsborg secures a Europa League last-16 spot.
